# The `DwarfExpression` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Base class containing the logic for constructing DWARF expressions independently of whether they are emitted into a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> or into a .debug&#95;loc entry. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Base class containing the logic for constructing DWARF expressions independently of whether they are emitted into a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> or into a .debug&#95;loc entry.

Some DWARF operations, e.g. DW&#95;OP&#95;entry&#95;value, need to calculate the size of a succeeding DWARF block before the latter is emitted to the output. To handle such cases, data can conditionally be emitted to a temporary buffer, which can later on be committed to the main output. The size of the temporary buffer is queryable, allowing for the size of the data to be emitted before the data is committed.

Definition at line 44 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfexpression-h">DwarfExpression.h</a>.

<Link id="a467e19938e9af2b1003b8e56a07f8919a64e30e01fb92fbed321319e4cbc7b868" />
<EnumerationListItem name="EntryValue">
 (= 1 &lt;&lt; 0)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a467e19938e9af2b1003b8e56a07f8919a9e467bd00311a19e75a75f808990ac0f" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Indirect">
 (= 1 &lt;&lt; 1)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a467e19938e9af2b1003b8e56a07f8919a54208072c432df3a9f411db14390bb64" />
<EnumerationListItem name="CallSiteParamValue">
 (= 1 &lt;&lt; 2)
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

Currently, entry values are not supported for the Memory location kind.

### addMachineReg() {#a57484713254f31f8412d08ff85259761}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool DwarfExpression::addMachineReg (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &amp; TRI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">llvm::Register</a> MachineReg, unsigned MaxSize=~1U)</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Emit a partial DWARF register operation.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="MachineReg">The register number.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="MaxSize">If the register must be composed from sub-registers this is an upper bound for how many bits the emitted DW&#95;OP&#95;piece may cover.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>
If size and offset is zero an operation for the entire register is emitted: Some targets do not provide a DWARF register number for every register. If this is the case, this function will attempt to emit a DWARF register by emitting a fragment of a super-register or by piecing together multiple subregisters that alias the register.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
false if no DWARF register exists for MachineReg.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfexpression-h/#l00187">187</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfexpression-h">DwarfExpression.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfexpression-cpp/#l00100">100</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfexpression-cpp">DwarfExpression.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### addStackValue() {#a93f0796a16275cd71f21761c339cd19f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void DwarfExpression::addStackValue ()"
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Emit a DW&#95;OP&#95;stack&#95;value, if supported.

The proper way to describe a constant value is DW&#95;OP&#95;constu &lt;const&gt;, DW&#95;OP&#95;stack&#95;value. Unfortunately, DW&#95;OP&#95;stack&#95;value was not available until DWARF 4, so we will continue to generate DW&#95;OP&#95;constu &lt;const&gt; for DWARF 2 and DWARF 3. Technically, this is incorrect since DW&#95;OP&#95;const &lt;const&gt; actually describes a value at a constant address, not a constant value. However, in the past there was no better way to describe a constant value, so the producers and consumers started to rely on heuristics to disambiguate the value vs. location status of the expression. See PR21176 for more details.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfexpression-h/#l00212">212</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfexpression-h">DwarfExpression.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfexpression-cpp/#l00192">192</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfexpression-cpp">DwarfExpression.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
